name: Paradise: A Bartender's Tale
description:
A tale of a simple bartender, making his living serving magic drinks.

NOTE: This is a demo version of the game, intended to test the systems and dialogue. Only the tutorial/prologue chapter is currently available. Apologies to anyone who downloaded before the failsafe measures to prevent game crashes were implemented. Please look forward to more chapters!

Paradise: A Bartender's Tale is a visual novel inspired by VA-11 HALL-A: Cyberpunk Bartending Action.

Art/Code/Design/Writing/Everything Else Not Listed
Daniel Le

BGM by Austen Kinney

Title Screen Art by Daniel Arrubla Duque

UPDATE NOTES V .203.1:
- added failsafes to eliminate ren'py errors for unfinished paths
- added end of demo message
